alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tippah and east central Benton Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gravestown, or 9 miles west of Ripley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Blue Mountain, Gravestown, Falkner, Dumas, Murry, Clarysville, Whitten Town, Peoples and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
